values:
Hi, I'm ok !

It was the army. They told me to stay indoors upstairs and turn off all the electrics. They also gave me food and water so staying put seemed like a good idea.

I haven't seen anything today but there was another truck going round with a message saying everything has returned to normal so I decided to plug the computer back in.

C rang. Apparently he couldn't get close to home so he headed back to work. Its a warehouse with forklifts with big spikes on them. They had to spike a few of the warehouse staff but mostly everyone is ok.

I think I'll be keeping my head down for a few days, but its quiet here now and well my friends list seems to suggest that everything is getting better all over.

Here's hoping.

Its getting dark. Properly dark not just closed curtain dark.

I think I can hear cars moving around. I might be imagining it though. I'm going to try and peep out the curtains again. See if there is anyone moving about.

I can hear what sounds like loud hailers. Shouting voices. I wonder if its the police or the army, there has to be some benefit to being the biggest town close to a huge Army base.

Its quite quiet here. This is good. I can stay here with the internet and find out when it is safe to come out. If I have to find food before then, well I'll have to find food. At that point I'll find a vehicle too. 

There is a car alarm going off and screaming. It just started as I started typing. Christ I wish i had the jeep. Its daft and little and blue but its a 4x4 and its strong. I hate hiding here in the nearly dark, waiting to see what happens. With a bloody larp sword as a weapon. I feel like a stupid hippy and I'm getting a baseball bat if the world survives. Or a gun depending on how things turn out.

Someone is still screaming. It sounds like a woman. Is it bad of me to be glad its not a man ? I've got my phone with me but I dare not ring anyone in case they are hiding. Or in case I can't get through. No answer would be bad right now.

I hope zombies can't look up. Or don't want to eat cat. I wish Milly would come off the window sill. Maybe I'll get a big savage dog to go with the baseball bat. I wonder if the comet did it ? I wish we shopped better, at least I'd have food.

I'm rambling. I'll stop and see if any of the news sites have anything more for me.

Okay I guess I have to write the words down to actually believe them.

But I can't. Its insane.

Lets try it.

There are zombies in the garden. Dead people are eating other people in my garden. 

And there is no food in the house. So even if I manage to survive today, by some miracle, with no weapons, no car and two cats, I'm going to starve to death.

I guess I can worry about that later. If there is a later. Me and the cats are going to hide upstairs. I'm taking the computer up with me so at least I can get some idea of whats going on.

C hasn't made it home yet. I'm not thinking about that.

OK I'm really scared now.

The bloke in the back garden seems to be doing something to the next-door neighbour that fell asleep on their lawn.

It doesn't seem to be a good thing.

I wish C would hurry up. I'm not liking this and America seems to have gone mad judging by my friends list.

I'm scared now. 

The bloke in the garden is walking round in circles and hes definatly making the wierd noise.

I'm going to ring C, see if he can come home half an hour early.

The noise moved round the back. Which is wierd. That seems to be the best word to describe today - wierd.

I sort of peeped through the curtains and I think there is someone in the garden. The back door is locked though so I'm just going upstairs until they've gone away.

Its a bit cowardly but this isn't really the sort of area you call the police in.

Stuff is done.

Its mostly still quiet again. Probably everyone is asleep after last night. There is a wierd noise coming from outside occasionally, like moaning I guess, but its probably the wind.

midnightschilde
 has been posting about crazies in Middlesbrough. I'm so glad I don't live there anymore sometimes.

The noise is getting louder, I might go and see whats making it. Or maybe not, it'll probably stop.

I just needed to share what I saw out of the back window.

One of the neighbours seems to have gone to sleep on the lawn in their garden.

Its great round here.

Anyway going to do stuff not involving the PC. So I'll be back later :)

Well the noise has stopped which is nice.

But now its pouring down.

There is no point in putting the telly on even as it'll just be doom and gloom about the UK being washed into the sea or flooding us into the dark ages or whatever. They never take the opportunity to discuss global warming at a time people might actually take note.

I think I can probably get away with doing some sewing now. Its late enough that the neighbours can't really complain if the sewing machine wakes them up and anyway they kept me awake most of the night.

I still can't get through to work, this is weird. Everyone is supposed to start at 8.

And my friends list is full of people talking about a comet, but I think that was just visible over America. It sounded like it was quite cool to see though.

Its still quite noisy outside. It sounds like someone put ecstasy in the water, all the crap cheesy dance music and screaming. I guess I should open the curtains and see whats going on but I think I'm going to play some Age of Conan for a bit instead.

-19

As a 1930s wife, I am
Very Poor (Failure)

They are CLOTHES, they do not somehow make the person less of a human being than you.

Went to Maelstrom, got cold, drunk, cold, tired, then on Sunday actually did some roleplay.

Sunday was fun and I'm now waiting to see if any random people photographed me so I can see what I looked like in full green.

I hate my job,
I hate my life,
I'm not fond of a large proportion of the people I know and I think it's mutual.
I hate christmas,
I hate people who feel I should justify my existance,
I hate people who think I'm here for their benefit,
I hate people who are snide, if you have a problem tell me or stay away from me, I don't care,
I hate people who put up with me because of *insert reason*, I'm not stupid I do know,

I hate the fact I'm going to sit here and cry because nobody cares, nobody is bothered,
I hate the fact I've been programmed that anger is bad and hence I can't cope with being angry,
I hate the fact that I'm not allowed to be upset, I just have to get on with it,

I hate the fact the first time I tried to kill myself was 19 years ago on Christmas eve and that I am still thinking about doing it, however briefly, everyday,

I hate the fact that anti-depressants make me worse and other people have made it so I can't talk about it because it's just a shock tactic to be wielled out when they actually mean "I'm a bit upset". 

This is a message to preserve my sanity. I'll continue surviving and I'll continue coping. Because nobody is ever going to help.

just in case you don't know who I am, I'm Sam from F&H.

I'm the Leeds LO, Guildmistress of Alchemy and Mayor.

If you want me to unfriend you please post, or if you know any other F&H live journalers let me know.

If there is enough of us we could start a community. I'm not sure how that works though.

Sam

almongst other F&H stuff I visited the Bath costume museum.

I was disappointed - there was very little on display and none of the stuff that was on display was that exciting :( I'm glad I hadn't just gone down to go there which I had planned on doing at some point.

I have a new corset and 2/3 of a top made.

So by Thursday night I need to finish the top and sew a skirt.

It's not impossible (depending on the amount of hand sewing involved) but it's only sightly likely.

I hate that I put things off to the last minute. I promised myself that before this fest I wouldn't be sewing like a mad person but i guess i failed.

Oh well more sewing tomorrow :)

I Am A: Lawful Good Human Bard Mage

Alignment:
Lawful Good characters are the epitome of all that is just and good. They believe in order and governments that work for the benefit of all, and generally do not mind doing direct work to further their beliefs.

Race:
Humans are the 'average' race. They have the shortest life spans, and because of this, they tend to avoid the racial prejudices that other races are known for. They are also very curious and tend to live 'for the moment'.

Primary Class:
Bards are the entertainers. They sing, dance, and play instruments to make other people happy, and, frequently, make money. They also tend to dabble in magic a bit.

Secondary Class:
Mages harness the magical energies for their own use. Spells, spell books, and long hours in the library are their loves. While often not physically strong, their mental talents can make up for this.

Deity:
Oghma is the Neutral Good god of knowledge and invention. He is also known as the Binder of What is Known, and is the Patron of Bards. His followers believe that knowledge reigns supreme, and is the basis for everything else that is done. They wear white shirts and pants, with a black and gold braided vest, and a small, box-like hat. All priests of Oghma are known as Loremasters. Oghma's symbol is a scroll.

Find out What D&D Character Are You?, courtesy ofNeppyMan (e-mail)

Where's going to be good to go drinking at next weekend in Darlington or Middlesbrough ?

We've got people coming which is an excuse to go out but no where to go !!!

Some actual sewing happened !

I have a front and a half sewed of the monster kit. That I want for sunday. That I won't get to do anything with on Saturday. Hmmm. No sleep for me tomorrow night :(

I now I could do more now but I'm tired and I have to get up in the morning for work. 

On a slightly sureal note I was proposed to by Private Message tonight. Well more accuratly Izzy was and I did propose first when slightly tipsy at Sintel Fest. It's strange how these things happen but it means I get to be a Baroness and thats one in character aim fulfilled. 

Don't know whether we are going to do a wedding yet. It would be a good excuse to wear a big frock (which due to crazy typing just came out as fonk) and I suppose historically quite ok to still wear the dress for best, but I'm unsure what'll happen. Have to wait and see.

Work is still good. The people who I'll be working with that have been in America since I started might be back tomorrow. That'll be nice to see the people I keep talking to on the phone. And C's mum is coming out of hospital tomorrow ready for her birthday on Saturday.

I wonder if tiredness is terminal. It feels it at the moment and I don't know why. I'm mostly happy, mostly sleeping ok (despite elbow in eye situations) and only background level stressed (I think, I might be wrong there though), its probably from not eating properly but hopefully I'll get my head round that next week.

Except work is sending me to Oldham for Wednesday + Thursday so that might not happen either.

Me tired - must sleep now.

Stolen from lots of people ...

Post anything that you want, and post it anonymously. Anything. A story, a secret, a confession, a fear, a love -- anything. Be sure to post anonymously and honestly. Post twice if you'd like. Then, put this in your LJ to see what your friends (and perhaps others who you don't even realise read your LJ) have to say

Firstly I don't have easy internet access at work no more so less postings then ever for me :(

But work is good so that's alright :)

C's mum is in hospital so I don't get home till nearly 9 o'clock most nights so I'm not getting anything done sewing wise :(

But at the weekend I did get Monster kit cut out and already to start sewing :)

I just got told that the punishment I'd set a guild member wasn't going to be allowed by the CC despiter the fact that 2 other Senior refs said I could - so I had and have now had to email people and say that it's not happening :(

So I feel blah, and tired, and just a teeny bit pissed.

But I get paid on Friday so that is good :)

Your Existing Situation
Physical illness, over-tension, or emotional distress have taken a severe toll. Her self-esteem has been reduced and she now needs peaceful conditions and considerate treatment to permit recovery.


Your Stress Sources
The situation is regarded as threatening or dangerous. Outraged by the thought that she will be unable to achieve her goals and distressed at the feeling of helplessness to remedy this. Over-extended and feels beset, possibly to the point of nervous prostration.


Your Restrained Characteristics
Willing to participate and to allow herself to become involved, but tries to fend off conflict and disturbance in order to reduce tension.
Believes that she is not receiving her share--that she is neither properly understood nor adequately appreciated. Feels that she is being compelled to conform, and close relationships leave her without any sense of emotional involvement.

Clings to her belief that her hopes and ideas are realistic, but needs encouragement and reassurance. Applies very exacting standards to her choice of a partner and wants guarantees against loss or disappointment.




Your Desired Objective
Needs to feel identified with someone or something and wishes to win support by her charm and amiability. Sentimental and yearns for a romantic tenderness.


Your Actual Problem
Depleted vitality has created an intolerance for any further stimulation, or demands on her resources. This feeling of powerlessness subjects her to agitation and acute distress. She attempts to escape into a substitute world in which things are more nearly as she desires them to be.

thats the plan. It'll keep me busy over the winter and I mihgt even get C's grey velvet cassock done. I have some velvet for it but I'm not sure if there is enough so I keep putting it off and he doesn't bug me about it (which is nice) and I have other thing's he make that he probably would want more - hughly bagged red tarten trousers where being mentioned on Friday and branch monster kit was mentioned this morning. I'll really have to get started with something ! Even if its just sending off for fabric samples from One of the only fabric sites I could find in England so I can think about what fabrics I'm going to use.

The pattern - I love this sooo much The plan is velvet (obviously for me) - either purple, if I can get some that's really dark, or black. I may make the frog fastenings if I get really keen in which case they will be purple otherwise they will be black. I have cloaks but I wanted something different and this is it. I do worry about it being a bit huge - I'm only 5'2" and, whilst not beng the skinniest person in the world, I could still end up looking swamped. When this pattern actually arrives - I had to order it but as they where all half price and had the other two in stock, I didn't mind too much - I'll have a better idea about how big those sleeves really are! This uses a small ton of fabric (seven + yards of outer, lining and interling and more for ruffles) but I just love it so very much. It's also an advanced Vogue pattern which should be a challenge but that'll be nice as I manage to keep interested longer the more difficult something is. I've just thought about having to sew that much velvet and I'm starting to waver on that as an option. My sewing machine isn't that good and seems to particularly dislike velvet. Maybe brocade could be an option after all! (It'll end up being velvet and I'll end up shouting but I'll like it better in the end)

First the pattern No. 5843 Again better picture later. I'm making the yellow version and the top tunic of the white one. So basically tied sleeves, bustier, lightweight over tunic. This is going to be next years banquet kit. I've changed my mind on trim and fabrics 80 million times already but it'll be purple and the trim will probably be diamante/gem stone of some description. I'm thinking some sort of iridescent/shot silk or taffeta for the dress and chiffon or organza for the over tunic. But this is subject to change when something else catches my eye. Or I decide that beading the bustier is actually a reasonable option in which case the dress will end up being something dull (as in not shiny) as I'm scared of too much fuss.

This will probably get made first as I've actually made some firm decisions on where I'm going with it. Monster Kit I'll try to put a better picture up later but basically add long sleeves and take out the side slits to the one on the right. At the moment the front pattern is a main bit with a extra piece filling in the right shoulder but the idea is to make two full fronts turning it into a jacket rather than a top. I intend to use a decent fake suede and a removable thin fleece lining so I'll probably make it a size too big to allow for the thick material. The only thing I'm not settled on is whether to fasten it with silver buckles or try and find some big skull (or something similar) buttons - I imagine it'll depend on what I can find. Anyway this is the first plan.

Nobody reads this anyway so I'm going to fill it with my costuming nonsense! I keep having ideas and then promptly forgetting them so hopefully if I out them in here it might stop.

Due to just getting a new job (Yey!!!) I should hopefully be able to buy what I want and not just whats in the local remnant shop for a change so I can plan a bit more than usual.

Firstly I should say to anyone reading this - IT'S FOR LARP - it's not in the least historical and based on Big 3 Patterns. I have mad historical stuff - 2 Elizabethan corsets, a chemise and 3 quaters of an Elizabethan but they don't really fit with what I want. I want something that the none costume orientated can go wow at rather than just people that now that it maybe a wonderful recreation of a painting. I want to make beautiful recreations but I'm just too lazy !

I shall now split to new posts on the three different things that are awaiting my crazed planning ...

I am an overly sleepy kitt- **zZzZzZzZZZzZzzZzZzzZzZZzzZZZZzZZZZ...**
